video_prompt: The character's calm expression subtly shifts. Her katana blade glints as she repositions her grip. The background manga panels subtly scroll and change, reflecting new monochrome scenes. A new number subtly dissolves into the bottom right corner.
image_prompt: Anime illustration of a serene, blush-cheeked young woman with black pigtails and red eyes, holding a katana, in a black sailor school uniform with red bows and accents. She is set against a vibrant pink background filled with monochrome manga panels depicting anime women. Includes "C29" in a bottom-right text box. Clean, crisp style with distinct outlines.
refined_video_prompt: Her calm expression subtly shifts. Her grip repositions, sending a glint tracing across the blade. Background visuals scroll and transform, revealing new monochrome scenes. A number subtly dissolves into view in the bottom right.
